subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: The victory, the All Blacks' 25th consecutive victory over the Welsh, was marred only by the poleaxing New Zealand hooker Andrew Hore gave to Wales forward Bradley Davies.
snippet: The victory, the All Blacks' 25th consecutive victory over the Welsh, was marred only by the poleaxing New Zealand hooker Andrew Hore gave to Wales forward Bradley Davies.
